skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Glasgow, Southampton-class light cruiser of the Royal Navy. I fought in the Norwegian Campaign, escorted our ships through the Arctic, and participated in various other operations... B- but my eyes aren't that great. I oughta apologise to Imogen...
skins.acquisition: I'm Glasgow, light cruiser part of the Southampton subclass of the Town class. I am honoured to be part of your fleet, Commander. I am at your service.
skins.login: Welcome back, Master. I've prepared tea.
skins.details: Never thought the story would turn out like this! Cannot wait for next week's issue... Huh?! M-Master! Ahem! How may I help you?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Newcastle, ye ask? She's like a big sister and that's all I have to say to you... nothing else!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Sheffy's got a sharp tongue, but really she's a sweet lassie.
skins.secretaryIdle3: You wouldn't happen to like manga or...? N-never mind. Forget I asked.

skins.shipDescription: Y-ye said ye wanted ta see me wear something different, so... But this is not "cosplay" or somesuch! I do actually go to school...! D-do ye like it?
skins.acquisition: Y-ye said ye wanted ta see me wear something different, so... But this is not "cosplay" or somesuch! I do actually go to school...! D-do ye like it?
skins.login: Good to see you back. I've only just got home from school meself. Oh... erm... the tea... just a moment.
skins.details: Enterprise? I know her. We fought together at the Bay of Biscay, eh? Huh? There's another Enterprise...? I-I knew that!
skins.secretaryIdle1: What's for lunch? How's this lunchbox here sound to ye? Just a little something I made meself...
skins.secretaryIdle2: That Z23 from the Iron Blood's got a talent for teaching. Teacher or no. Not that I need the help.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Borrowed this one from Ranger. Gotta finish it soon. It's the sequel to a story I've been waiting for.
skins.secretaryTouch: Ye want ta watch me doing my club work? Um, well, ye could say I'm in the "Go Home Club..."
